name: turnkey-governor
description: Turnkey Governor is a repository used to easily deploy OpenZeppelin Governor and ERC-20 token with safe defaults

scripts.report: forge coverage --no-match-test testFuzz --report lcov && genhtml -o report --branch-coverage lcov.info && rm lcov.info

scripts-comments.debug-mode: To enable debug mode, add the --debug flag to any command. Example: 'pnpm deploy:test --debug'
